actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 3 Mining Picks. Can replace 1 with Throw Explosive.

actions.name: Mining Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Throw Explosive
actions.desc: Throws a minor explosive at one creature it can see within 30' of it. Target: 9 (2d8) force and is knocked prone (DC 13 Dex half damage and isn't knocked prone).

actions.name: Explosive Charge (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Throws a powerful explosive at a point it can see on the ground within 60' of it. Each creature within 15 ft. of that point: 9 (2d8) fire and 9 (2d8) force and is pushed up to 10 ft. away from the point and knocked prone (DC 13 Dex half damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone). If creature fails save by 5+ it is also deafened for 1 min. Alternatively sapper can place the explosive in a space within 5 ft. of it and delay the explosion until end of sapper's next turn or when a creature moves to a space within 5 ft. of the explosive whichever happens first.

special_abilities.name: Crafty
special_abilities.desc: The sapper has advantage on ability checks made to pick locks or to detect disarm or set traps.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If subject to effect that allows Dex save for half damage takes no damage on success and only half if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.
